title: Diamond/Challenger Team Looking for Coach
body:
TKG Is a Diamond and Challenger Average team who is looking to get someone on board to be a coach.
Coaching involves drafting tournaments, giving advice during scrims, VOD reviews and all around team strategy.

TKG Has a helpful management team, what is willing to help with everything, we now need someone to push the players to the next step and become the best they can.

The Coach will have free reign to come up with strategies as they please.
No experience is necessary but would be helpful.
More then anything we are looking for someone passionate about helping the players get better while improving themselves as a coach and enjoys what they do.

*This position is unpaid, you will again a lot of experience and working with one of the fastest growing organisations in OCE.

If you want to be part of something great, you can contact us via email: TerraKnightsGaming@gmail.com , Facebook: www.Facebook.com/terraknightsgaming or add me in game : TKG Hal

Thanks and I look forward to hearing from you.

replies.body: this team is 1 level up from "zilean put your w on me when I go in" in terms of rank.

Necessity is an illusion, it is used to attempt to invoke importance on something. Nothing has purpose, purpose is an illusion we made up to try and explain why things have outcomes. People don't look at the process in a reversed state to wonder, maybe it wasn't designed to be that way? The outcome is just the result of the reaction which was the result of the infinite reactions to precede it.

At the end of the day this beloved ranked system everyone seems to be willing to give their life to defend is just blatantly flawed. Riot basically took a cube and tried to fit it into a circular hole and told everyone that it works perfectly. The worst part is that almost everyone is stupid enough to believe it.
It'd be such a meme if you guys had a Bronze coach. Hint. Hint.
